title: 2018 Predictions: Democratic Pollster Paul Maslin on Doug Jones and the road ahead
description: In 2017, Democratic pollster Paul Maslin teamed up with Joe Trippi to work on the longshot Doug Jones campaign in Alabama - and they believe they had a shot to win the state even before reports of sexual assault allegations were made against Roy Moore.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
